it's a Hebrew letter and it has some

to divide or to shatter to break and it

that encompasses both of those meanings
that's in Jeremiah 23 29 it says is not
my word like as a fire say away and like
a hammer that breaks the rock in pieces
so it symbolizes a fire and also like
the letter of shin actually looks like

what happens at yom teruah when it's

there's a division between the righteous
